      • timeoutLinks

        public void timeoutLinks()
        Iterates through the list of links and deletes if the last discovery message reception time exceeds timeout values.

      • addLinkToBroadcastDomain

        public void addLinkToBroadcastDomain(Link lt)
        Put a link into the map of portBroadcastDomainLinks. Broadcast domain links are the links found via BDDP packets.
        Parameters:
        lt - link to put into the list.

      • removeLinkFromBroadcastDomain

        public void removeLinkFromBroadcastDomain(Link lt)
        Remove a link from the map of portBroadcastDomainLinks. Broadcast domain links are the links found via BDDP packets.
        Parameters:
        lt - link to remove

      • deleteLinksOnPort

        public void deleteLinksOnPort(NodePortTuple npt)
        Delete all links associated with a NodePortTuple object.
        Parameters:
        npt - a node-port tuple

      • addOrUpdateLink

        public Link addOrUpdateLink(long remoteSwitchId,
                   int remotePort,
                   org.openflow.protocol.interfaces.OFPortDesc remotePhyPort,
                   long localSwitchId,
                   int localInPort,
                   org.openflow.protocol.interfaces.OFPortDesc localInPhyPort,
                   boolean isStandard,
                   boolean isReverse)
        Add or update link information. used by OFMLinkDiscovery.handleLldp method. After creating the Link and LinkInfo object, (remote is set to source, and local is set to destination) this method first calls addOrUpdateLink(Link, LinkInfo) method. Then, if the LinkInfo is correctly set, search the LinkInfo object for the reverse link. If none, this method sends out a LLDP discovery for the reverse link by calling OFMLinkDiscovery.sendDiscoveryMessage(long, short, boolean, boolean). For a BDDP packet, this method just tries to enrolls the reverse link information by calling addOrUpdateLink(Link, LinkInfo).

      • updatePortStatus

        public boolean updatePortStatus(java.lang.Long switchId,
                       int portnum,
                       org.openflow.protocol.interfaces.OFPortStatus ps)
        Update port status. In result, listeners are notified on the link update. Used by OFMLinkDiscovery.handlePortStatus method.
        Parameters:
        switchId - switch identifier
        portnum - port number
        ps - OFPortStatus message
        Returns:
        true if link info changed, false otherwise

        Parameters:

      • addOrUpdateLink

        private boolean addOrUpdateLink(Link lt,
                      LinkInfo newInfo)
        Add or Update a link information.
        1. If link was first found, the link goes into links structure. If the link was discovered via BDDP packets, the links goes to the portBroadcastDomainLinks by calling addLinkToBroadcastDomain(Link).
        2. If the found link exists, the information is updated. If the discovery method changes between LLDP and BDDP, the link is added to or removed from the portBroadcastDomainLinks structure.
        Parameters:
        lt - target link to update or add
        newInfo - information of the link
        Returns:
        true if a link info is successfully updated or added. false otherwise.

      • getAllRestApi

        public OFModel.RESTApi[] getAllRestApi()
        return the list of all RESTApi objects.
        Specified by:
